post.body: Would obviously rip a hole in the fabric of the universe.
Aha! I added a negative. How was the trip?
Warum kannst du nicht jetlag haben?
Schlaf! (Wilkommen zueruck)
Forgot to ask you about your sweet playlist last night. What's number 1?
He's like a bad penny--he just keeps turning up. Am i mixing my metaphors here?
oh man chip?
at stl but am leaving now!
It occurs to me that I have never been to the Smithsonian.
Lulz, courtesy of @chickpattysan: http://tinyurl.com/8bmr39 "While you were talking there, I went ahead and stopped crime. Like, all of it."
The lady takes great libertie or rather licence to traduce whom she please, and thincks she daunces in a net.
CNN's "We recommend" feature recommends to me "China targets Web sites with 'porn' content" and "Man tests Facebook nipple policy."
Geez, she's even been working too. Also, she broke up with Charlie Sheen after he _accidentally shot her in the arm_?
Kelly Preston: the actress time forgot.
Headline: "Sirius Black Takes Another Matrimonial Plunge." I seriously had a moment where I thought, huh, guess Harry Potter is real.
Ad for Nancy Grace: "Lady Justice, meet your wake-up call"? Really? That's the way we're gonna go with this?
This little heater is literally the best thing ever. LITERALLY. Thanks to those who offered advice.
Damn! No more magazine subsciptions on eBay.
"I would be more interested in a Bologna Society."
Sweet $12 meal voucher.
